subject: Archive plan
description:
**Type:** Task

**Description:** Archive the plan after all tasks are complete:
- Create folder `dreamy-napping-tome` in `./plans/completed`
- Rename the plan to a name befitting the actual plan contents
- Move it into `./plans/completed/dreamy-napping-tome`
- Read session ids from `./plans/completed/dreamy-napping-tome`
- For each session id, move `~/.claude/tasks/<session-id>` to `./plans/completed/dreamy-napping-tome/tasks`
- Update any "in_progress" task to "completed"
- Commit changes
- Push changes to the PR

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- [ ] Plan archived to `./plans/completed/`
- [ ] Task sessions moved
- [ ] Changes committed and pushed

**Skills to Invoke:** `/git:commit`

**Verification:**
- Type: manual-check
- Command: `ls ./plans/completed/dreamy-napping-tome/`
- Expected: Plan file and tasks directory exist

verification.expected: Plan file and tasks directory exist
